Headline: #84 Peterson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Peterson/California
ShortDescription: EB 84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted via Peterson, California, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr, Western and Peterson due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted via Peterson, California, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr, Western and Peterson due to, street blockage near Peterson/California.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Northwest Highway/Nagle

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Northwest Highway, Devon and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Northwest Highway/Nagle.
